title: Give me this Mountain
description: ‘Give Me This Mountain’ is the autobiography of Dr. Helen Roseveare, well–known missionary doctor and author. She worked in the north–eastern province of the Belgian Congo with the Heart of Africa Mission in the 1950’s and 60’s. Physical dangers and her personal ambition in the Congo often almost sank her, but her faith and hard work brought her through. Her story is one of bright mountains, conquered after experiencing the dark valleys and learning to give the glory to God.
author: Helen Roseveare
